15.title: Encounters II

151.content:
It's not going to be easy but you know who you need to find. The nicest guy in school, someone who would actually help you in your small size rather than...whatever else could happen. Renzo usually lived halfway across town, but lucky for you, today was the special athletic meet for the school and Renzo was sure to be there. Normally getting to the school was as easy as crossing the street, but somehow you doubted it would be quite the same at this size.

Looking around, you notice one of the model cars you collect, vintage 80's classic. The car itself was only a few inches but for someone as small as you, it was perfect. Luckily you run over, getting into something that was a toy for you only one night ago.

Now things felt better. Being in the model car was strange, but you finally felt like things were in perspective again. The only thing different was the world around you, a bit unfamiliar but much less intimidating than it had been moments ago. With newfound hope you drive your little vehicle out, speeding through the hallways of your home like you were in a live action movie. It was all oddly, very exhilarating.

Soon you stop at the main entrance, looking out into the gigantic lawn that served as the entrance to the rest of the world. Alright, here we go. Across the street and into the school. No problem, right?
151.title: School Mate

choices: Renzo puts you in his large, empty hamster cage

Renzo's younger brother wants to play with you
Renzo takes you to the gym during his workout
1512.content:
So, you got behind your little toy car and you started pushing it down the hallway of the house while the front door was wide open. Once the car started to pick up speed, you jumped into the front seat and you decided to hold on as the car rolled down the hall and into the living room, gliding across the main entrance and finally sailing through the front door before rolling down the steep walkway which led to the sidewalk.

You then remembered the slight crack in the sidewalk right at the base of the walkway leading to the front door and wonder how that would affect your ride. As you come rolling down the walkway, you spot the crack! You try to lean as far as you can to the right, hoping you can steer the car away from the crack, which is on the left. The front wheel of the car rolls across the crack, making it turn slightly to the right, sending you and the car into a patch of grass! Crash! The car rolls off the sidewalk and overturns on the grass, sending you sailing through the air until you land head-first in the grass.

Just when you open your eyes and look up following your accident, you spot a large figure looming over your small, frail body. As you squint and rub your eyes, you recognize the towering giant. It’s Renzo, one of your classmates from school and your best friend and soccer teammate. In fact, the first thing you notice are his spikes. He is wearing cleats, shorts and his soccer jersey.

“Holy crap, dude! What happened to you? How the hell did you get so small?” Renzo smiles as he squats down and reaches over and lifts you up with his giant fingers. He gently places your small 3-inch tall body in the palm of his giant hand as he stands up straight and examines you. “Wow… You’re so tiny!”

“Renzo! You gotta help me, man! I shrunk! Something made me really, really tiny! Please! Help me!” you shout at him as he looks down at your tiny figure, which is surrounded by his large fingers on one side and his wrist on the other.

“Well, we got soccer practice at school today, so I’ll just bring you along with me, little dude! After that, I’m taking you home with me! Don’t worry! I’ll take care of ya!” Renzo smiled as he placed you in his shirt pocket of his jersey. As you look down, you see his long, muscular legs walking forward, towards the soccer field. Renzo had thick, muscular quads and calves, just like a star soccer player. When you look up, you see Renzo’s neck, his chin and you can barely catch a glimpse of his face. At least, you feel safe. Renzo has been your friend for years at school, so he wouldn’t hurt you.

Renzo walks to the soccer field and spends a lot of time sitting on the bench until he’s called to play. Suddenly, you feel a lot of running, stopping, jarring, jumping and shouting. Occasionally you feel him kicking the ball and you hear him shouting at another teammate, but you feel safe as long as you can stay with him. After the game is over, you carefully look up from his shirt pocket and you notice he’s walking towards his house. What does Renzo do to you once he gets home?
1512.title: There's no need! Renzo is coming right at y...

153.content:
Your door flies open, a huge man stepping in. He was only wearing a pair of boxers, that looked a lot like Desmond's favorite boxers. He had a little bit of chub around his stomach, but for the most part he looked rather fit. "It's almost noon," he said as you continued to look him over. He had dark brown eyes and a familiar face...

Colby!

He was someone you went to high school with, well actually he was a year behind you. You hadn't known him super well, just as a friend of a friend's younger brother. You might have made out with him drunk in a closet. You might have also fucked him after getting dumped by your girlfriend at prom too. Anyway, last you had heard was he decided to go abroad for college. Of course that was a couple years back now.

Your focus was brought back to the present when Colby started to walk further into the room. He was coming closer to the bed where you were. Why? You weren't sure, and you weren't sure how safe the bed was anymore either.

154.content:
Your thoughts of confusion were interrupted when the sound of a door opening filled the air. You had little time to assess the situation before the booming voice of your step brother Jake, filled the room.

"Hey bro? You home? I need to borrow your laptop charger."

You and Jake had always been close, ever since your mom remarried. He was always looking out for you and always had your back. However it was difficult to know if he still did, because you were the size of an action figure on the floor.

Looking up you stared at the giant form of Jake with his messy hair and size 12 shoes as he entered the room and threw his coat on a chair. As he did you got a better view of where you were. It was Jake's room, a mini bachelor pad that you two used to hang out in together.

While you were busy lost in thought, Jake had turned his attention to the mirror hanging from the closest door and was busy fixing his hair. Even though he was gigantic compared to you, it was still the same old Jake and that meant you had to get his attention if you were going to figure out what happened.

Taking a deep breath you step out into the open and begin waving and shouting frantically. "Jake! Down here! Jake! It's me! Jake!"
154.title: Giant Step Bro
